Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
MedicalRecords.MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord extends Object
Represents the medical records of a patient. Handles loading, viewing, adding, and updating medical records.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • addMedicalRecordEntry

      public void addMedicalRecordEntry(String appointmentID, String diagnosis, String treatmentPlan)
      Adds a new medical record entry for an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
      diagnosis - The diagnosis provided.
      treatmentPlan - The treatment plan prescribed.

    • updateMedicalRecordEntry

      public boolean updateMedicalRecordEntry(String appointmentID, String diagnosis, String treatmentPlan)
      Updates an existing medical record entry for an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to update.
      diagnosis - The new diagnosis.
      treatmentPlan - The new treatment plan.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful; False if the entry was not found.

    • findEntryByAppointmentID

      private MedicalRecord.MedicalRecordEntry findEntryByAppointmentID(String appointmentID)
      Finds a medical record entry by appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The appointment ID to search for.
      Returns:
      The MedicalRecordEntry if found; otherwise, null.

    • saveMedicalRecordEntryToFile

      private void saveMedicalRecordEntryToFile(MedicalRecord.MedicalRecordEntry entry)
      Saves a single medical record entry to the file.
      Parameters:
      entry - The medical record entry to save.

    • escapeCommas

      private String escapeCommas(String input)
      Escapes commas in strings to prevent CSV parsing issues.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string.
      Returns:
      The escaped string.

    • loadMedicalRecords

      private void loadMedicalRecords()
      Loads all medical records for the patient from the file.

      private List<String> parseCSVLine(String line)
      Parses a CSV line, handling commas within quoted strings.
      Parameters:
      line - The CSV line to parse.
      Returns:
      A list of parsed fields.

    • saveAllMedicalRecordsToFile

      private void saveAllMedicalRecordsToFile()
